page.title: 18Employment in Much Marcle
page.content: I asked a lady who has lived in Much Marcle for fifty years where the villagers used to work.She said that nearly everyone was employed in agriculture or at westons cider factory,and hardly anyone left the village to work.Today some of our parents still work at westons or in farming.However many travel by car to near by towns.One or two travelled far away to work.Cathys father travels all the way to Aylesbury and she only sees him at weekends.Soon Cathys family will move away from the village to be close to her fathers work.Quite a lot of parents are now starting their own businesses at home and are self employed. It is very difficult for the young school leavers to find any work in Much Marcle and they have to leave the village.
